title: Time Lock (restored, colorized) (1957, thriller, imdb score: 6.1)

sources.title: Time Lock (restored, colorized) (1957, thriller, imdb score: 6.1)
sources.description: Time Lock is a 1957 British thriller film directed by Gerald Thomas . The plot is about a six-year-old boy who is accidentally locked in a bank vault. With less than 10 hours of oxygen left in the vault, it becomes a race to save the boy. The film features a young, pre- James Bond Sean Connery . The boy is played by Vincent Winter and his parents are played by Lee Patterson and Betty McDowall . Although set in Canada the film was shot in England .
